title: Vox Media Acquires Tech News Site Re/Code
teaser: The growing digital media company has added Re/code to its stable of niche websites, which also include Vox and SB Nation.
contentencoded:
Vox Media has announced that Re/Code is the newest member of its family. Vox is the parent company of the news site Vox, the sports site SB Nation and the shopping site Racked.

Vox Media has been around for six years and continues to increase its audience with different niche sites. Frequent listeners of Here & Now have heard reporting from Re/code reporters and editors, as part of our weekly Monday tech segment.

Here & Now host Jeremy Hobson speaks with David Folkenflik, NPR’s media correspondent, about the acquisition.

  • Read Re/code’s statement about being acquired by Vox

Guest

  • David Folkenflik, media correspondent for NPR. He tweets @davidfolkenflik.
